name: Hunter
description:
FLAVOR:

  • Best ranged class in the game

  • Actually useful travel stuff

  • Traps!

  • Hunting horn with large area of effect

WEAPONS

  • All ranged

  • Light polearms

  • Common

  • No shields, no helms

ENGAGEMENT:

  • None by default, can specialize to gain some?

ABILITIES:

  • Expanded crit range w/ ranged?

  • Trap types: snares, foot traps, haussepieds, pit

  • Horn blasts for buffs, misdirection, frightening

  • Actually useful travel stuff

  • Hound or raptor, very simple mechanics

  • Specialization: Hunting stuff underwater --> trident
